channel.title: Hi, I have a few question's
channel.description:
First off, my first question is.. How do I change the COLOR text, I am using pur3pkftw's client, and it has glow3:wave:(player's txt) and I would like to know how to take that out.
Secondly, using pur3pkftw's client again, when i click on the scroll arrows up and down on the chat box, its like an inch off, how would i fix it? Please no flaming, advice and help, links also is what im looking for! Thankss!
